inclusion.criterion: acute liver injury [ALT>3NL, AST>3NL or TB>2NL within 1 week]
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: acute decompensation [ascites, hepatic encephalopathy, bacterial infection, gastrointestinal bleeding or jaundice(TB>5NL)within 1 month]
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: hepatocellular carcinoma or other liver malignancies
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: severe chronic extrahepatic disease including chronic obstructive pulmonary disease
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: combined with respiratory failure, coronary heart disease with cardiac function level 3 (NYHA), myocardial infarction in the 3 months before admission, diabetes with severe complications and chronic kidney disease with end-stage renal failure
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: receiving immunosuppressive drugs for reasons other than chronic liver disease
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of HCV and recent coinfection with HBV. He is on treatment for the past 6 months.
